w:r.w:t: This lesson is primarily focused on conversational questions to get to know other people. Your student will be able to practice making friends and learning how carry
introductive conversation with people they have just met. This lesson is open to freely
carry on a conversation with your student and practice grammar with your student.
At completion of this lesson, students will be able to:
Ask questions to the people they care about.
Practice proper grammar and questioning intonation
